byline.original: Correspondence of the New-York Daily Times

lead_paragraph: The Equinox brings with it a continuation of the delightful weather which we have enjoyed- for the last fortnight. A few months ago our Sundays used to be regularly disgraced by riots, but now, thanks to the efficiency of the Marshal's police, we are quiet and orderly.

headline.main: PHILADELPHIA.; Weather-Odd-Fellows' Parade--Arrival of the President.
